metadata.title: Why Are There Keys That Have Not Been Initialized?

sections.content:
Question:
Why isn't the ON/OFF data of keys 48 to 63 initialized when using the mutual capacity method when using Workbench6?
Answer:
This problem has been confirmed in Workbench 6 Ver.1.05.00.00 and earlier versions.
We have resolved it in Ver.1.06.00.00 and later, so please use the post-resolution version.
Workbench6 is now in maintenance status, and we do not plan to update it in the future.
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
